amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Secure Electronic Network for Travelers Rapid Inspection (SENTRI) program by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the funds for the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Filner amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 274 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Filner.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Filner amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 274 (Roll no. 307).
